attributes.action: Make it illegal to rise insurance upon accident if it was not the driver's fault
attributes.additional_details: It is simply unfair to make those drivers' lives more difficult by increasing the insurance fees upon an accident if it was not his/her/their fault.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to rise insurance fees of a vehicle upon suffering from an accident through no fault of the driver's.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban insurance premium increases after no-fault accidents
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550470
